duties_responsibilities.duty: Design key technical components of the solution and direct technical resources to develop and deliver project deliverables.
Reduce project technical risk by uncovering design issues early in the project life cycle and share implementation best practices.
Conduct design/code reviews during major project milestones.
Fulfill commitments consistently on-time and proactively escalate commitments that are in jeopardy.
Judge the tradeoffs with technology and feasibility and make choices that fit the constraints of the project.
Design and implement business technology solutions focused on cloud-based business applications, specifically Salesforce, and other custom solutions.
Provide mentoring and guidance to other team members, including offshore team members.
Serve as a subject matter expert and guide customers towards appropriate solutions for their needs.
Participate actively in Discussions, build a reputation as a go-to resource for the toughest problems, and contribute to the Asset Libraries.
Provide pre-sales support as requested and oversee technical decisions and activities of project teams.
Understand platform limitations and design alternatives to work around limitations and monitor technical deliverables for consistent quality as well as compliance with company standards.
Partner with project managers to monitor project status and risk areas and demonstrate knowledge to design and build high-performance technical solutions on the Salesforce platform.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Management Information Systems, or a related field plus 5 years of experience with Salesforce development. Service Cloud Certification and one or more current Salesforce certifications are highly preferred.
